description: Mind-Shattering Performance, Precision-Tuned Fidelity and ROAR Audio™ Power is what the Sound Blaster Roar is. The Sound Blaster Roar sports a pair of compact and powerful 1.5” drivers with an active 3” high excursion driver, individually driven from its bi-amplified design with two side firing passive radiators, for uncompromising clears and impressive bass. The Sound Blaster Roar also features ROAR: Instant additional audio power that boosts loudness, depth and spaciousness. As part of the Sound Blaster line of speakers, the Sound Blaster Roar features USB host audio and together with the Sound Blaster control panel via a USB connection to your computer, the Sound Blaster Roar can access SBX Pro Studio technologies such as SBX bass and SBX Dialog that intelligently enhances PC audio real-time.
title: NEW! Creative Sound Blaster Roar: Portable NFC Bluetooth Wireless Speaker with aptX/AAC. 5 Drivers, Built-in Subwoofer, Incredibly Powerful. Amazing Price of $149.99!
